ComicInfo.Summary:
The hidden champion of the Dark Side club is revealed â€“ Milestone's own Static, in his shocking introduction to the modern DC Universe! Since proving too powerful for the confines of the Club, Static has been kept under lock, key and heavy sedation in its basement cells. Now he's unleashed against Ravager as her ultimate test!
